short_description: Experience in-flight calm with ultra-soft fleece and a light-blocking hood designed to fit over headphones. This travel blanket wraps you in warmth and serenity, making long flights or layovers more restful and stress-free.

Designed for movement, this compact travel blanket folds into its own zippered pouch and clips to bags with a carabiner. The trolley sleeve slides over luggage handles, keeping your hands free through terminals, gates, and checkpoints.

Keep essentials close with a discreet zippered pocket that secures your passport, phone, or wallet. Built with a heavy-duty travel zipper, this blanket resists snags and stays sealed—no fumbling or stress at the airport or onboard.

More than a blanket—this 3-in-1 essential transforms into a pillow or wearable pouch. Use it as a cushion, wrap it for warmth, or wear it hands-free. It adapts to planes, trains, cars, and terminals for ultimate travel flexibility.

Built for airport sprints, in-flight naps, and road trip stops, this travel blanket is a must-pack essential. Lightweight, functional, and ready to go—just clip it, zip it, and you’re prepared for any journey, anywhere.

name: PAVILIA Travel Blanket Pillow, Soft Airplane Blanket 2-IN-1 Combo Set, Plane Blanket Compact Packable, Flight Essentials Car Pillow, Travelers Gifts Accessories Luggage Backpack Strap, 60x43 Navy Blue
short_description: SOFT COZY TRAVEL BLANKET - This compact airplane throw blanket is packable and portable, designed for traveling, flying, camping and road trips. This plane blanket is plush and warm, keeping travelers warm through long flights and road trips. The travel blanket folds compactly into a pillowcase for easy storage. An ideal air travel accessories gift for women, men, adults. Perfect for sleeping on the plane, car, bus, train, airport, home, office and emergency use.

AIRPLANE BLANKET OR PILLOW - When the travel blanket is folded away, the microplush case bag can be used as a pillow to lay your head or to support your neck. The dual zipper pouch design also makes it a perfect hand warmer cushion for sleeping forward during your flight. This plane blanket is an international traveler’s essential and airplane attendant’s favorite, a must have for both weekend travel trips and long flights.

SILKY SOFT AND DURABLE - Made of 260 GSM premium high quality microfleece polyester, the airplane blanket is lightweight, warm, and plush. Fabric feels luxurious, fuzzy, velvety to touch. It is thick enough to retain heat to keep warm on long chilly flights, provides excellent comfort for relaxing and dozing off all journeys long. This blanket measures 60 x 43 inches, and 12 x 11 inches when converted into a portable bag pillow.

STRAP TO LUGGAGE OR BACKPACK - The carrying bag has a luggage strap with a built-in detachable buckle for easily securing the blanket to luggage, backpack, suitcase, or hand bag. The adjustable strap is designed to be seamless and convenient and eliminates the need for extraneous carabiners or clips.
MACHINE WASHABLE BLANKET - Easy to care - the travel blanket gets softer with each wash. Wash separately in cold water; Tumble Dry Low.

While other POCKET BLANKETS are made from a stiff, nylon material which makes noisy, crinkling sounds & often has a strong irritating smell, the GROUND MAT FROM ECCOSOPHY IS A COMPACT BEACH BLANKET MADE FROM ODORLESS, SMOOTH TO THE TOUCH FABRIC. It creates a soft armor between you & the ground where you can quietly relax, inhaling the smells of the great outdoors.

RELAX, REALIGN & CLEAR THE MIND. Claim a spot anywhere outdoors unfold your portable blanket & sit still, lie down or MEDITATE. This waterproof mat will KEEP YOU DRY & CLEAN. It's LIGHTWEIGHT & SMALL enough to "live" in your bag so you can TAKE IT WITH YOU EVERYWHERE YOU GO!

BE PLAYFUL, SPONTANEOUS & INSPIRED! Go HIKING & say YES to the CAMPING trip. Go to the SPORTS EVENT or let loose at the FESTIVAL. Grab your spot to watch the PARADE & FIREWORKS...no matter when or where... your ECCOSOPHY ground cover provides you & your loved ones a place to sit & CREATE LIFELONG MEMORIES.

ALL THE BELLS & WHISTLES ARE INCLUDED BECAUSE LIFE IS MEANT TO BE EASY! Your 55x60" camping tarp has corner pockets ideal for SAND STUFFING & ANCHORING the blanket at the beach. The loops & stakes are perfect when using this picnic blanket on soil. The zipper pocket is super cool & handy while the matching carry pouch & carabiner make it THE IDEAL TRAVEL ACCESSORY.

THE GIFT THAT KEEPS ON GIVING! If you are looking for kids camping gear , backpacking gear, beach accessories, camping accessories OR if you know OUTDOOR ENTHUSIASTS & NATURE LOVERS then this is the last STOCKING STUFFER you will EVER have to buy! Ideal Outdoor gear for DOGS TOO!
